TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Clipboard extends System.Object
public ref class Clipboard abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供便于将数据传入和传出系统剪贴板的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static methods that facilitate transferring data to and from the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用于所有应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]共享系统剪贴板，因此可能会有所变动时切换到另一个应用程序。All applications for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application. 有关可用于与预定义格式的列表类，请参阅类。For a list of predefined formats available to use with the class, see the class. **安全警报：** 出于安全考虑，应记住保留以下几点。**Security Alert:** For security purposes, the following points should be kept in mind. - 粘贴操作需要用户启动 （Ctrl + V，粘贴菜单）。Paste operations need to be user initiated (Ctrl-V, Paste Menu). - 复制仅可在用户所选内容。Copy can only be on user selected content. - 复制或剪切，部分受信任代码放入纯文本和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]到剪贴板。On copy or cut, partial trust code puts plaintext and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] on to the clipboard. 纯文本包括文本、 Unicode 文本、 OEM （对象 Exchange 模型） 文本和 CSV （逗号分隔值）。Plaintext includes text, Unicode text, OEM (Object Exchange Model) text, and CSV (Comma-separated values). - 在粘贴时，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]将粘贴[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]该内容的源是否来自同等信任或更多受信任的站点。On paste, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] will paste in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] if the source of that content is from a equally trusted or more trusted site. 尤其是在下列情况下：Specifically: - 部分信任应用程序可以将粘贴[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]从完全信任应用程序。A partial trust application can paste [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] from a full trust application. - 部分信任应用程序可以将粘贴[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]从部分信任应用程序。A partial trust application can paste [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] from a partial trust application. - 完全信任应用程序可以将 XAML 粘贴只能从另一个完全受信任的应用程序。A full trust application can paste XAML only from another fully trusted application. - 非[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]完全信任应用程序可以检查 ApplicationTrust 格式在剪贴板上的并在适当净化 XAML。A non-[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] full trust application can examine the ApplicationTrust format on the clipboard and sanitize the XAML if appropriate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将数据添加到系统剪贴板。The following example shows how to add data to the system Clipboard. [!code-csharp[DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode#_SetData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_setdata)] [!code-vb[DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode#_SetData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_setdata)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 从系统剪贴板中清除任何数据。

span.span: Clears any data from the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法相当于调用**OleSetClipboard**(**null**)。Calling this method is equivalent to calling **OleSetClipboard**(**null**).

summary.span: 查询剪贴板上是否存在 数据格式的数据。

span.span: Queries the Clipboard for the presence of data in the data format.

returns.span: 如果剪贴板中包含 格式的数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Clipboard contains data in the data format; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`true`仅当指定的数据格式以本机方式存在在剪贴板上; 此方法不会检查是否存在的自动转换的数据格式。This method returns `true` only if the specified data format exists natively on the Clipboard; this method does not check for the presence of auto-convertible data formats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`true`仅当指定的数据格式存在于本机或可作为自动转换的数据格式在剪贴板上; 此方法不会检查是否存在的自动转换的数据格式。This method returns `true` only if the specified data format exists natively or is available as an auto-convertible data format on the Clipboard; this method does not check for the presence of auto-convertible data formats. 位图表示计算机图形为在内存中，位数组，这些位表示图像中单个像素的属性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.IDataObject GetDataObject() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataObject () As IDataObject

summary.span: 返回表示剪贴板全部内容的数据对象。

span.span: Returns a data object that represents the entire contents of the Clipboard.

returns.span: 一个数据对象，它可以对系统剪贴板的全部内容进行访问；或者，如果剪贴板上没有数据，则为 。

span.span: A data object that enables access to the entire contents of the system Clipboard, or if there is no data on the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过启用对系统剪贴板上的数据的访问*数据对象*，即，实现的对象接口。Access to data on the system Clipboard is enabled through a *data object*, that is, an object that implements the interface. 通过定义的预定义的格式列表类。A list of predefined formats is defined by the class. 使用指定的方法和字段中来检查和数据对象中提取数据。Use the methods specified by and fields in to examine and extract the data from the data object. 若要检查系统剪贴板上的数据的格式，请调用此方法返回的数据对象。To examine the formats of data on the system Clipboard, call on the data object returned by this method. 若要从系统剪贴板中检索数据，调用并指定所需的数据格式。To retrieve data from the system Clipboard, call and specify the desired data format. 剪贴板共享的所有应用程序的系统，因此剪贴板中的数据可能会更改由其他应用程序。The system Clipboard is shared by all applications, so data on the Clipboard is subject to change by other applications.

permission.span: 若要访问系统剪贴板上的数据的权限。

span.span: for permission to access data on the system Clipboard.
Associated enumeration: **AllClipboard**.

span.span: A collection of strings, where each string specifies the name of a file in the list of dropped files on the Clipboard, or if the data is unavailable in this format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，数据置于系统剪贴板上与应用程序退出时自动从剪贴板中清除。By default, data placed on the system Clipboard with is automatically cleared from the Clipboard when the application exits. > [!NOTE] > 清除剪贴板在应用程序退出的默认行为可能不同于其他实现中，这可能会将数据保留在剪贴板上，应用程序退出，而不是默认情况下清除。The default behavior of clearing the Clipboard on application exit might differ from other implementations, which might leave data on the Clipboard on application exit rather than clearing it by default. 使用重载，并指定`copy`参数，因为`true`如果不希望从在应用程序退出剪贴板中清除的数据。Use the overload and specify the `copy` parameter as `true` if you do not want data cleared from the Clipboard on application exit. > > 提供的基本实现接口。 provides a basic implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位图表示计算机图形为在内存中，位数组，这些位表示图像中单个像素的属性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 此方法添加数据时启用自动转换。This method adds data with auto-conversion enabled.
